derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French amarante or modern Latin amaranthus, alteration (on the pattern of plant names ending in -anthus, from Greek anthos 'flower') of Latin amarantus, from Greek amarantos 'not fading'

encyclopedia.content: 词典解释 名词 n. 1. 【诗】不凋花 2. 【植】苋菜 3. 紫红色详解 amaranth英文翻译为不凋花，苋属植物，紫红色 别名 星辰花、补血、匙叶花、匙叶草、三角花、斯太菊、矶松 学名 Myosotis sylvatica 中文名 勿忘我或勿忘草 英文名 Forget-me-not 或Don't-forget-me 分类 紫草科、勿忘草属 everlasting flowers 保持花卉姿态和色泽不变的人工干制的花卉干制品。 草本，植株高50～79厘米，叶自根出，羽状分裂，着生在茎基向四方生长

means.word_mean: 1. seed of amaranth plants used as a native cereal in Central and South America
2. any of various plants of the genus Amaranthus having dense plumes of green or red flowers; often cultivated for food
